headline: Paramount merger likely means S&P 500 departure, analyst says
summary: Paramount's (PSKY) $8 billion merger with Skydance is finally complete, and investors are watching closely to see what comes next. Needham & Company senior media and internet analyst Laura Martin joins Market Catalysts with Julie Hyman to explain what the new management team has planned. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Skydance Media and Paramount Global Complete Merger, Creating Next Generation Media Company
summary: Skydance Media and Paramount Global today announced the completion of their merger, creating a premier standalone global media and entertainment company, Paramount, a Skydance Corporation ("Paramount"). Paramount Class B shares will begin trading today on the Nasdaq Stock Market LLC under the new ticker symbol "PSKY." An Open Letter from David Ellison is also available at www.paramount.com/news.
